heading: HB04125
0: AN ACT INCREASING THE BED CAPACITY OF DATU HALUN SAKILAN MEMORIAL HOSPITAL ALSO KNOWN AS THE PROVINCIAL HOSPITAL OF TAWI-TAWI IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF BONGAO, PROVINCE OF TAWI-TAWI FROM LEVEL 2 WITH FIFTY (50) BED AUTHORIZED CAPACITY TO LEVEL 3 WITH TWO HUNDRED (200) BED AUTHORIZED CAPACITY, UPGRADING ITS SERVICES AND FACILITIES AND PROFESSIONAL HEALTH CARE, AUTHORIZING THE INCREASE OF ITS MEDICAL PERSONNEL AND THEIR SALARIES, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2019-05-20, transmitted to the Senate on 2019-05-21 and received by the Senate on 2019-05-21 Substituted by HB08984
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04125
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INCREASING THE BED CAPACITY OF DATU HALUN SAKILAN MEMORIAL HOSPITAL ALSO KNOWN AS THE PROVINCIAL HOSPITAL OF TAWI-TAWI IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF BONGAO, PROVINCE OF TAWI-TAWI FROM LEVEL 2 WITH FIFTY (50) BED AUTHORIZED CAPACITY TO LEVEL 3 WITH TWO HUNDRED (200) BED AUTHORIZED CAPACITY, UPGRADING ITS SERVICES AND FACILITIES AND PROFESSIONAL HEALTH CARE, AUTHORIZING THE INCREASE OF ITS MEDICAL PERSONNEL AND THEIR SALARIES, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

DATE FILED : 2016-10-18
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE

          -Transmitted to Appro on July 22, 2017
